title: Smartphone penetration as share of population in Indonesia 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Share of population with a smartphone
summary: Overall Share of population with a smartphone has increased over the Year.
Share of population with a smartphone is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Share of population with a smartphone, about 33.0 was reported at Year 2023
Minimum Share of population with a smartphone about 26.0 was reached at Year 2018
